name: Special thank you to first 100 Youtube subscribers
name_original: Special thank you to first 100 Youtube subscribers
description: Hello! This is my way of saying THANK YOU to my first 100 Youtube subscribers. I look forward to making more content to help you on your game dev journey. Speaking of which, I included some of my GDevelop extensions in this game. Can you spot them all? Thanks for watching and game on, my friends!
